name: SCANS II cetacean sightings on primary platform of vessel surveys 2005
description: The European Union (EU) Habitats Directive requiresMember States to monitorand maintain at favourable conservation status those species identified to be in need of protection,including all cetaceans.In July 2005 we surveyed the entire EU Atlantic continental shelf to generate robust estimates ofabundance for harbour porpoise and other cetacean species.The survey used linetransect sampling methods and purpose built datacollection equipment designed to minimise bias in estimates of abundance.

headline: SCANS II cetacean sightings on primary platform of vessel surveys 2005
